text: Vy budete daty vashi pryynyati nazvy ditey shcho zberihayete yikhnye spivvidnoshennya do yikhnikh henetychnykh batʹkiv. Tse ye bilʹshe rivnopravne u vydovyshchi BOHA. Yakshcho vy ne znayete yikhnikh batʹkiv, todi, yak vashi braty u relihiyi, vy budete obrobyty yikh tomu shcho chleny vashoyi rodyny. Vy ne zdiysnyuyete hrikh yakshcho vy robyte pomylku u tsʹomu vidnoshenni; vy ye vidpovidalʹni dlya vashykh navmysnykh namiriv. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
